name: Md. Tahsin Hasib
paragraph: I'm an undergraduate Computer Science & Engineering student at American International University in Bangladesh. I'm a quick learner with a strong interest in web development, driven to solve complex problems and develop innovative solutions that make a difference. I enjoy the fast-paced nature of web development as a frontend developer and adapt to emerging trends and industry best practices to produce appealing digital products that leave a lasting impact on users. My interests also extend to competitive programming, where I solve complex coding challenges and improve my problem-solving skills. In academics, I have consistently achieved top honors, earning a place on the Dean's List for two semesters of my undergraduate studies.
